meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Ivory Coast Foes Meet An uneasy calm returned to Ivory Coast as the new president and his opponents held meetings that suggested a truce in a weeklong political crisis. PAGE A3
Sierra Leone's Diamonds Sierra Leone resumed diamond sales under a labeling plan approved by the United Nations, which had set an embargo to keep gem revenues from fueling war. PAGE A7
Ivory Coast Foes Meet An uneasy calm returned to Ivory Coast as the new president and his opponents held meetings that suggested a truce in a weeklong political crisis. PAGE A3
Sierra Leone's Diamonds Sierra Leone resumed diamond sales under a labeling plan approved by the United Nations, which had set an embargo to keep gem revenues from fueling war. PAGE A7
Arrests in '85 Jet Blast Canada arrested and charged two Vancouver-area men in the deaths of 329 people aboard an Air-India Boeing 747 that blew up over the Irish Sea in 1985. PAGE A7
Harcourt Sold for $4 Billion The publisher Harcourt General was sold to Reed Elsevier and Thomson for $4.4 billion, a lower price than expected because of consolidation in the industry. PAGE C1
